total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the numbers 1, 3, 6, and 7 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the range of the 5s in the input grid.
Q3: Divide the range of 5s into four sections according to the locations of the numbers 1, 3, 6, and 7.
Q4: Replace the 5s in each section with the corresponding number (1, 3, 6, or 7) from Q1.
Q5: Keep the rest of the grid the same as the input grid.
Q1: Identify the locations of the numbers 1, 3, 6, and 7 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the range of the 5s in the input grid.
Q3: Divide the range of 5s into four equal parts.
Q4: Replace the first quarter of 5s with the number found at the location identified in Q1.
Q5: Replace the second quarter of 5s with the number found at the location identified in Q3.
Q6: Replace the third quarter of 5s with the number found at the location identified in Q4.
Q7: Replace the last quarter of 5s with the number found at the location identified in Q2.
